positive_examples: This is an example of architectural designing.
The architectural designing demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed architectural designing in this context.
A typical case of architectural designing would involve these features.
The concept of architectural designing applies here.
The process of planning and creating the structural and aesthetic elements of buildings and physical spaces.
negative_examples: This is an example of graphic designing, not architectural designing.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: GraphicDesigning, or other types of Designing

definition: The creative process of conceiving and planning buildings and structures.
